name: @tagspaces/extensions
description: Providing support for legacy TagSpaces extensions

scripts.link4dev: cd .. && export CDIR=$PWD && npx rimraf $CDIR/tagspaces/release/app/node_modules/@tagspaces/extensions && ln -sf $CDIR/extensions $CDIR/tagspaces/release/app/node_modules/@tagspaces
scripts.link4dev2: cd .. && export CDIR=$PWD && npx rimraf $CDIR/tagspaces/public/modules/@tagspaces/extensions && ln -sf $CDIR/extensions $CDIR/tagspaces/public/modules/@tagspaces
scripts.copy-web: cd .. && rimraf web/modules && shx mkdir -p web/modules/@tagspaces/extensions && shx cp -rL release/app/node_modules/@tagspaces/extensions/* web/modules/@tagspaces/extensions/
scripts.build: node postversion.js && npm run build-media-player && npm run build-md-editor && npm run build-md-editor-next && npm run build-text-editor && npm run build-pdf-viewer
scripts.build-media-player: cd media-player && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-md-editor: cd md-editor && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-md-editor-next: cd md-editor-next && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-text-editor: cd text-editor && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-pdf-viewer: cd pdf-viewer && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.drop-pdf-viewer: cd pdf-viewer && npm run clean:pdfjs && cd ..
scripts.copy-build: npm run copy-media-player && npm run copy-text-editor
scripts.drop-build: npm run drop-media-player && npm run drop-text-editor && npm run drop-pdf-viewer
scripts.copy-media-player: shx cp -rL media-player/build/assets media-player && shx cp media-player/index.html media-player/index.backup && shx cp media-player/build/index.html media-player
scripts.drop-media-player: shx cp media-player/index.backup media-player/index.html && npx rimraf media-player/assets media-player/index.backup
scripts.copy-text-editor: shx cp -rL text-editor/build/assets text-editor && shx cp text-editor/index.html text-editor/index.backup && shx cp text-editor/build/index.html text-editor
scripts.drop-text-editor: shx cp text-editor/index.backup text-editor/index.html && npx rimraf text-editor/assets text-editor/index.backup
scripts.pkg-publish: npm version patch && npm run build && npm run copy-build && npm publish --access public && npm run drop-build
